pr_title: Added a simple test for LiftoverHaplotypeMap

timeline.bodyText:

                    new LiftOverHaplotypeMap().instanceMain(new String[] {"INPUT=" + HG18_HAPLOTYPE_MAP,
          
          
            
                            "OUTPUT=" + tmp.getAbsolutePath(), "SEQUENCE_DICTIONARY=" + HG_19_SD,
          
          
            
                            "CHAIN=" + CHAIN });
          
          
            
            new LiftOverHaplotypeMap().instanceMain(new String[] {"--I", HG18_HAPLOTYPE_MAP,
          
          
            
                            "--OUTPUT", tmp.getAbsolutePath(), "--SEQUENCE_DICTIONARY", HG_19_SD,
          
          
            
                            "--CHAIN", CHAIN });
timeline.author: cmnbroad

replies.bodyText: hmmm. I think that this sort of change should be done as a separate PR.... (also I tried and it failed...)
replies.author: yfarjoun

replies.bodyText: Its new code - why would we create more new legacy code that will have to be changed later ? Anyway, not working is a more serious issue - I'll try it and see why it fails.
replies.author: cmnbroad

replies.bodyText: Anyway, it seems to work for me.
replies.author: cmnbroad

timeline.message: clipped chain file so it's not so big...

timeline.bodyText: You could use try-with-resources to avoid explicit close here.
timeline.author: pshapiro4broad
